creator: Ronald Dwk
descriptionHtml:
Official Website:✨✨✨
http://www.ronalddwk.com

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.😊😊😊
ronalddwk@gmail.com

Icon Pack contains 10700+ HD Icons for mobile phones and tablets, click on "See More" at the bottom of the page or search for "Ronald Dwk" for more icon packs, there are over 300 icon packs both free & paid to choose from in different colors, shapes and designs. Enjoy

Features:
---------------
• Icon Masking
• Tutorial in app
• 280 Folder Icons
• 196 App Drawers
• 10700+ HD Icons
• Analog Clock (Widget)
• 448 Dynamic Calendars
• Wallpaper save location
• App Light and Dark theme
• FAQs with search function
• 100 HD cloud based wallpapers
• Icon previews with search function
• Localization: Supports 17 languages
• Quick apply for your default launcher
• Regular & Premium Icon Request Options
• Firebase Cloud Messaging (Update Notifications)
• EXTRAS-Lots of alternatives to mix and match eg...System, WhatsApp etc...
• Supports 41 launchers, there might be more supported launchers which I haven't tested yet.

👍Compatible with the following Launchers:👍
ABC, Action, ADW, Apex, Atom, Aviate, Blackberry, CM Theme Engine, Evie, Flick, GO, GO-EX, Holo, Holo HD,Lawnchair, Lg Home, Lucid, M, Microsoft, Mini, Next, Niagara, Nougat,Nova, Pixel, Poco, Posidon, Smart , Solo, V, ZenUI, Zero

Fully Compatible but not Included in Apply Section: Apply via your Launcher
Arrow, ASAP, Cobo, Line, Mesh, Niagara, Open, Peek, Z, Launch by Quixey Launcher

N.B: I have tested on the above launchers, there might be more supported launchers which hasn't been tested yet.

STOCK PHONE LAUNCHERS 🤷‍♂️DO NOT SUPPORT custom Icon Packs🤷‍♂️ , you can try 👌Awesome Icons👌 or 👌Unicon-Icon Themer👌 to change icons manually on your stock launcher.

IMPORTANT: For "Icon Masking" to work, untick "Icon Masking" option within your custom launcher settings. "Icon Masking" it adds a icon back, icon mask & icon upon to all UNTHEMED icons.

Turn "Icon Masking" ON/OFF via your custom launcher settings.
I use Nova Launcher, for me its:
--------------------------------------------------
Nova Settings----->Look & Feel----->Icon Style----->UNTICK "Autogen" & "Reshape legacy icons".

How To Change Icons Individually
-----------------------------------------------------
1.Tap and Hold down on the icon then release it, then a small pop-up will appear.
2.It will allow you to change the icon and the name.
3.Select the icon, this will show your icon packs, select CPG IP and choose your favourite icon, Built-in Search Feature within the App.

• Launcher used in screenshots: Nova Launcher

STOCK PHONE LAUNCHERS 🤷‍♂️DO NOT SUPPORT custom Icon Packs🤷‍♂️ , you can try 👌Awesome Icons👌 or 👌Unicon-Icon Themer👌 to change icons manually on your stock launcher.

IMPORTANT: For "Icon Masking" to work, untick "Icon Masking" option within your custom launcher settings. "Icon Masking" it adds a icon back, icon mask & icon upon to all UNTHEMED icons.

Turn "Icon Masking" ON/OFF via your custom launcher settings.
Nova Settings----->Look & Feel----->Icon Style----->UNTICK "Autogen" & "Reshape legacy icons".

How To Change Icons Individually
-----------------------------------------------------
1.Tap and Hold down on the icon then release it, then a small pop-up will appear.
2.It will allow you to change the icon and the name.
3.Select the icon, this will show your icon packs, select CPG IP and choose your favourite icon, Built-in Search Feature within the App.

Features:
---------------
• Icon Masking
• Tutorial in app
• 280 Folder Icons
• 196 App Drawers
• 11 500+ HD Icons
• Analog Clock (Widget)
• 448 Dynamic Calendars
• Wallpaper save location
• App Light and Dark theme
• FAQs with search function
• Option To Bookmark Icons
• 100 HD cloud based wallpapers
• Icon previews with search function
• Localization: Supports 19 languages
• Quick apply for your default launcher
• Regular & Premium Icon Request Options
• Firebase Cloud Messaging (Update Notifications)
• EXTRAS-Lots of alternatives to mix and match eg...System, WhatsApp etc...
• Supports 41 launchers, there might be more supported launchers which I haven't tested yet.

👍Compatible with the following Launchers:👍
ABC, Action, ADW, Apex, Atom, Aviate, Blackberry, CM Theme Engine, Evie, Flick, GO, GO-EX, Holo, Holo HD, Lawnchair, Lg Home, Lucid, M, Microsoft, Mini, Next, Niagara, Nougat, Nova, Pixel, Poco, Posidon, Smart , Solo, Square, V, ZenUI, Zero

Fully Compatible but not Included in Apply Section: Apply via your Launcher
Arrow, ASAP, Cobo, Line, Mesh, Open, Peek, Z, Launch by Quixey Launcher

N.B: I have tested on the above launchers, there might be more supported launchers which hasn't been tested yet.

STOCK PHONE LAUNCHERS 🤷‍♂️DO NOT SUPPORT custom Icon Packs🤷‍♂️ , you can try 👌Awesome Icons👌 or 👌Unicon-Icon Themer👌 to change icons manually on your stock launcher.

N.B: Some Launchers require to change some icons Individually
How To Change Icons Individually
-----------------------------------------------------
1.Tap and Hold down on the icon then release it, then a small pop-up will appear.
2.It will allow you to change the icon and the name.
3.Select the icon, this will show your icon packs, select CGP IP and choose your favourite icon, Built-in Search Feature within the App.
